RecordData.desc: Rated by 6 clients on freelancer platforms
Trusted by global brands for design and digital solutions
Generated through websites, apps, and marketing globally
Delivered websites, branding, and full digital experiences worldwide

ReviewData.name: Konan
ReviewData.desc: Milos is a true professional, This was a very complicated project with multiple layers of schematic and PCB design involved that needed to be designed and executed within a short time constraint. The schematic that Milos designed was not only a genius interpretation of my idea but masterfully executed using a signal path and components i would have never thought to use myself. Milos, takes every care in ensuring designs are perfected and no mention of release of funds. I would highly reccomend

ReviewData.name: Philip
ReviewData.desc: Good work but needs to tidy up professionalism and 100% checking of designs. We will now move on to next milestone which I hope is smoother
